snippet: Tehrik-e-Taliban Pakistan, an umbrella group for militants, has taken responsibility for a bomb planted inside a vehicle that killed at least 20 people.
abstract: Bomb explodes inside vehicle at Pakistani military compound in the country’s northwest, killing at least 20 members of a paramilitary unit and wounding 30 more.
lead_paragraph: Tehrik-e-Taliban Pakistan, an umbrella group for militants, has taken responsibility for a bomb planted inside a vehicle that killed at least 20 people.

headline.main: Deadly Bomb Blast Rocks Pakistan Military Compound
headline.print_headline: Deadly Bomb Blast Rocks Pakistan Military Compound
